sentences.sContent: ...most are reluctant to post the results of their own labors online...
...which weakens demand and makes banks reluctant to lend...
...Big banks have been reluctant to switch to more secure technology because of the higher costs involved...
...The Target and Neiman hacks have also changed the cost calculation: although retailers have been reluctant to spend the $6...
...Why are so many companies reluctant to create an environment-friendly business system...
...Male directors mentor young men but are reluctant to get friendly with young women...
...Why are people reluctant to take on more debt despite the low interest rates...
...Many students are reluctant to give up the ability to flip quickly between chapters...
...the shortage of young adults is likely to make countries more reluctant to commit the few they have to military service...

synos.tran: 不情愿的；勉强的；顽抗的

remMethod.val: “驴拉坦克” → 真够勉强 → 勉强的
